definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: His performance tonight speaks volumes for his skillfulness.
sentences.chinese: 他今晚的表现充分说明他技巧之熟练。

sentences.english: Change is necessary and is something that is the unspoken law of nature.
sentences.chinese: 万物变迁是必然，这是不容分说的自然定律。

sentences.english: Finish saying, leaving no chance to explain of, beat her horizontal to embrace.
sentences.chinese: 说完，不由分说的，将她打横抱起来。

sentences.english: These results fully demonstrated that lotus root starch with limited water could accelerate retrogradation.
sentences.chinese: 此结果充分说明了莲藕淀粉在有限水分下更易老化。

sentences.english: The results show clearly that this procedure is correct.
sentences.chinese: 事实充分说明这种做法是正确的。

sentences.english: On arriving there, everybody went into action in no time. We dug square pits first.
sentences.chinese: 到了目的地后，大家不由分说，争先恐后地干起来。

sentences.english: To the city, the men without any explanation, began attacking the city.
sentences.chinese: 到的城下，不由分说，开始攻城。

sentences.english: This fully demonstrates that a totally unregulated market economy cannot work.
sentences.chinese: 这充分说明，不受管理的市场经济是注定行不通的。

sentences.english: That alone speaks volumes to the power of the TV-optimized website.
sentences.chinese: 这只充分说明了基于TV优化后的网站的力量。

sentences.english: The above small masterpiece amply illustrates the absurdity of mysticism.
sentences.chinese: 上面这则短小的杰作充分说明了神秘主义的荒谬性。

sentences.english: The holy is by definition pure: by definition.
sentences.chinese: 神圣不由分说肯定是纯洁的，肯定的。

sentences.english: It shows fully that the study of the essay and Chinese modern essay is very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 这充分说明了，研究随笔和中国现代随笔的烦难。

sentences.english: This fully testifies to the strength and potential of Nebraska's export to China.
sentences.chinese: 这充分说明了内布拉斯加州对华出口的活力和潜力。

sentences.english: On arriving there, everybody went into action in no time.
sentences.chinese: 到了目的地后，大家不由分说，争先恐后地干起来。

sentences.english: We wanted to explain, but he allowed no explanations and drove us away.
sentences.chinese: 解释，但他不容分说就把我们赶出门。

sentences.english: This has been proved by the production practice in CIP factory of Yu'erya Gold Mine.
sentences.chinese: 峪耳崖金矿炭浆厂的生产实践充分说明了这一点。

definition: to have no alternative/to be helpless
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
to confess one's fault/to accept one's punishment
to soothe/to pacify/to mollify/to mediate (in a dispute etc)
to explain the facts/to defend against an accusation
to say clearly/to argue clearly/to pronounce/pronounced
